title: Looking for free fonts that have the same kind of lower-case "a" as Avant Garde Gothic
content:
[http://www.linotype.com/195888/itcavantgardegothic-family.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20090614065601/http:/www.linotype.com/195888/itcavantgardegothic-family.html "http://www.linotype.com/195888/itcavantgardegothic-family.html")

Sorry, I’m not in your business so don’t know how to describe this ’o’-like lower-case ’a’, but that’s what I’m looking for.

Many thanks for your help!
author: Dragana Miljkovic

comments.content:
Sounds like you are looking for a “single storey” a.

[Century Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20090614065601/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/century-gothic/%E2%80%9D) is very similar to avant garde.

[Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20090614065601/http:/www.linotype.com/472/futura-family.html%E2%80%9D) is a good font to invest in, in my opinion. I have found it very useful over the years.

You could also try something with a slab serif, like [Geometric Slab 703](http://web.archive.org/web/20090614065601/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/geometric-slabserif-703/%E2%80%9D)

[Chalet](http://web.archive.org/web/20090614065601/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/collections/chalet%E2%80%9D) from House Industries has a retro-modern feel to it.
That’s super helpful, Kate, thanks so much!
